summary: Design a proper logging system for workflows that integrates with the worker logger instead of injecting console.log. Workflow internals need dedicated logging capabilities separate from user workflow code.
userImpact: Users cannot properly capture and manage logs from both workflow internals and their own workflow code in a unified way.
rootCause: Current console.log injection approach doesn't provide proper logging integration for workflow internals.
proposedFix: Integrate workflow logging with the worker logger instead of using console.log injection.
resolutionDetails: Implemented proper logging integration for workflows with worker logger.
keyQuote: Workflow internals do not and should never use `console.log` for logging, instead we should integrate with the worker logger.
